attributes.value:
1.提供意外身故賠償
2.投保簡易，毋需提供健康資料
3.可自選一系列附加保障
4.保證定期派發金額

1.Financial protection against accidental death
2.Sign and go – - need for health information
3.A range of supplementary benefits
4.Guaranteed regular and steady payments
